title: Special Accommodations
subHeader: Discover rooms designed for relaxation, style, and timeless luxury.

rooms.name: Presidential Ocean Suite
rooms.description: A stunning suite featuring a private terrace, infinity jacuzzi, and sweeping views of the Atlantic. Perfect for luxury seekers.

rooms.name: Penthouse Sky Villa
rooms.description: Located on the top floor, the Sky Villa offers an unmatched blend of comfort and exclusivity, complete with a private lounge.

rooms.name: Royal Honeymoon Suite
rooms.description: Designed for romance, this suite features a four-poster bed, private balcony, and rose-petal turndown service.

rooms.name: Executive Garden Villa
rooms.description: Nestled among tropical gardens, this spacious villa offers a private pool, outdoor lounge, and premium concierge services.

title: Standard Accommodations
subHeader: Where comfort meets elegance — designed for a restful and memorable stay.

rooms.name: Deluxe Ocean View Room
rooms.description: Wake up to the sound of waves in this elegant room with a sea-facing balcony and modern furnishings.

rooms.name: Classic Double Room
rooms.description: Comfortable and refined, this room offers a cozy retreat with queen-size bedding and a serene ambiance.

rooms.name: Superior Twin Room
rooms.description: Ideal for friends or colleagues, the twin room provides stylish comfort with premium amenities and work desk.

rooms.name: Garden View Deluxe Room
rooms.description: Overlooking the resort’s lush gardens, this room offers tranquility and charm with soft pastel interiors.

rooms.name: Standard Single Room
rooms.description: A simple yet elegant space designed for solo travelers, featuring all the essentials for a comfortable stay.

rooms.name: Poolside Standard Room
rooms.description: Enjoy easy access to the pool area from your doorstep, with a bright and refreshing design aesthetic.

rooms.name: Coastal Studio Room
rooms.description: Modern and compact, this room offers a smart design, ocean-inspired colors, and cozy workspace.

rooms.name: Mountain View Room
rooms.description: Perfect for nature lovers, this serene retreat overlooks the nearby hills and lush tropical greenery.
